meanings.definition: A facial expression showing happiness or amusement.
meanings.sent1: Her smiles brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: I love to see your smiles every day.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's tiny smiles were adorable.
meanings.sent4: The painting captured the essence of joyful smiles.

meanings.definition: To express happiness or amusement with a smile.
meanings.sent1: She smiles warmly at everyone she meets.
meanings.sent2: He always smiles when he sees his favorite movie.
meanings.sent3: The sun smiles down on the beachgoers.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seem to smile at the sun.
meanings.sent5: The child smiles with pure joy at the sight of balloons.

meanings.definition: To be characterized by a smile.
meanings.sent1: The portrait of the Mona Lisa smiles mysteriously.
meanings.sent2: The old photograph always smiles back at me.
meanings.sent3: The crescent moon smiles in the night sky.
meanings.sent4: The calm lake smiles under the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The friendly scarecrow smiles at the passing birds.
